title: My account was or is apparently being hacked..
body: My ip is stagnant.. but when I logged in about 20 minutes ago it said my account signed in from another computer.. and giving I have one computer I was like nah not like this. so I repeatedly change my password 2 -3 times.

replies.body: Hopefully, you were able to change your password and secure your account.  Just in case, you can use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide if you need some more resources.  If you have anything missing or concerns, feel free to hit up our account team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can look into it!
Well it was easily avoided by changing my password
